badgePositionDescription: Position the badge within the game page header
badgeSizeDescription: Choose a different size for the badge
clearCacheLabel: Clear the cache to force refresh all ProtonDB badges
expandOnHoverDescription: Minimalist Only. Display badge text on focus
disableSubmitDesc: Hide the submit button that allows contributing reports to ProtonDB
enableLibraryBadgeDesc: Show ProtonDB badge on game pages in your library
enableStoreBadgeDesc: Show ProtonDB badge as overlay on store pages
storeBadgePositionDesc: Position the badge overlay on store pages
originalPluginWarning: The original 'ProtonDB Badges' plugin is still installed. Please disable it in the Decky settings to avoid conflicts with this extended version.
